summary: Read description for info regarding Ryder's Quest
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][b][/b][/b][/center][b][u][color=#ff0000][size=4][b][center][/center][/b][/size][/color][/u][/b][center][size=5][b][u][i]News regarding Ryder and her Quest.[/i][/u][/b]
[/size][color=#ffff00][size=3]Due to a very significant setback in Ryder's quest I am unable to give a release date.
[/size]All lines have been recorded and summaries of the quest finished.[u] I am however in need of an individual capable of assisting me in making this quest [/u]and delivering it all to you, as I promised in my previous update. 
[/color][i]If interested Pm me here on the nexus.[/i][/center]
[b][u][color=#ff0000][size=4][center]This quest will be finished, with or without help. The release date however, without help, is not pretty.[/center]
[/size][/color][/u][/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91053]
[center][youtube]H8rADOsYJ88[/youtube][/center][/url]

[center][color=#ffff00][b][u][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Location/Info
[/size][/font][/u][/b]
[/color][list]
[*][color=#ffff00][b]Belethor's General Goods[/b]. [/color]
[color=#ffff00]
[/color][*][color=#ffff00][b]S[/b][b]pell sword[/b](Waraxe).[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
[/color][*][color=#ffff00][b]Can be married[/b].[/color]
[/list]

[b][color=#3c78d8]Be sure to endorse so I know that people want me to continue working on Ryder.[/color][/b]


[color=#e06666][b][u][left] [/left][/u][/b] ﻿[u]Credits[/u]

[/color][list]
[*][color=#e06666]For the hair: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/   (Ks Hairdos) (Somali Hair)[/color]
[color=#e06666]
[/color][*][color=#e06666]For the race: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/  (Ningheim)[/color]
[color=#e06666]
[/color][*][color=#e06666]Racemenu: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/    [/color]
[color=#e06666]
[/color][*][color=#e06666]For the Body: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666     (CBBE)[/color]
[/list]


[color=#f1c232]Thank you to all the mod creators that made this possible.
A huge thanks to Skyla for her video that got me started https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xcHw4sqrrx8&t=1s.[/color][/center][center][/center]
author: JackCouriers
